website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind its extra bulk and narrow lens, the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H20 is an otherwise excellent compact megazoom camera.

customer_reviews.title: Great, Well-Designed Compact Camera
customer_reviews.text: What a great compact camera. I have been using this camera for a relatively short while but really like it so far. It is an excellent size, small enough to fit jacket pocket or purse yet large enough to grip and hold solidly. The view screen is very clear and bright and easy to see, even on a bright day (although I am a big fan of eyepiece viewfinders, I find this one of the few cameras I have tried that can handle most brightness without the view screen image becoming bleached out. The camera turns on quickly, focuses quickly and takes excellent photos. Very satisfied at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera - 10X zoom and 720P video (w/zoom)
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most about this camera is the 10X zoom and the HD video. This is one of the few cameras that allow you to do OPTICAL zoom on the video (canon only do digital zoom while in video mode). The zoom is 38mm to 380mm (10X). Not that good for wide angle (38mm vs 24mm or 28mm in most P&S), but I prefer to have more zoom (380mm) than wide angle for short distance pics. Also the video format is MPEG4 which I believe is easy to manage and good in compression. Price is also perfect, got it for $230. Overall great camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Calderon

customer_reviews.title: I bought this camera
customer_reviews.text: I had a Sony h-l and got professional type photos with it years ago. The Carl Zeiss lens were in it and that is what I wanted with this camera. I also had to have a NON wide angle lens to capture dragonflys and flowers because the wide angle lens just could not get the clarity no matter how much the digital camera cost, such as the sxi10 Canon I tried. I like this camera for what I want it to do.. I am content with it..and will enjoy it for years to come.. I did a lot of searching to find the non wide angle and the Carl Zeiss lens again in a camera...
customer_reviews.author: S.Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: The DSC-H20 is wonderful! It has a lot of the features I was looking for and they all work well. The flash recharges very quickly and is plenty bright for indoor shots. The automatic focus is quick and works fantastic. The intelligent auto mode and scene recognition work too. Face detection is great. Battery life is good. I love the zoom capability. It's small and lightweight, thanks to the small battery. I really can't think of any cons! UPDATE 12/2012: I've had this camera for over 3 years now. I still love it. It must be well loved since the price has doubled since I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: AnnN

customer_reviews.title: WOW What a camera
customer_reviews.text: i have had this camers for years now. It is hands down the best camera I have had since my 35mm Rebel. Shoot really great pictures and has the ability to shoot burst shots, so you will not miss the action. It great for action shots and for scenic shots. Great lens give you a very clear picture and extremely good color quality. i have take many pictures that i have blown up to 20 x 25 and they look excellent. I could not be happier with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnS

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for new photographers
customer_reviews.text: I liked this camera very much. It is more than 10 years now, but still working the same. The quality of the image, battery charging capacity is still the same.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Love love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these cameras in 2009 and absolutely loved it. A year ago I spilled a bottle of water on it and ruined it. I was devastated. I tried replacing it with another Sony, and with a Panasonic, but I was very disappointed with them. Then I found a used model and took a chance .... and hooray! It looked and worked like a brand new camera. I am being very very careful with this now! It's just a great, great camera.
customer_reviews.author: CharleneB

customer_reviews.title: This was a great Camera. I traveled through Europe
customer_reviews.text: This was a great Camera. I traveled through Europe, Australia, New Zealand and USA with it. Now I have moved on to the SLR. Picture quality of this camera was superb, crystal clear and crisp.
customer_reviews.author: tracker

customer_reviews.title: phenomenal camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for three years now and it still works like brand new. Everyone raves about how clear and sharp the pictures come out. I see the price of this camera has going up. I only paid $100 bucks for it used. The best thing about it though the camera was still in the same box and the accessories were still in the plastic packaging. It looked like it was never used.
customer_reviews.author: P. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but had to return it. Not something that I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Vitaliy Yermolin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little camera
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new Sony H20 and I love it. It's a just right size for carrying around easily and it has so many great features. I've only taken a few pics so far, but they are great. The extra zoom is perfect. I really like that the view screen is big and sharp. The easy mode really helps 'old' eyes like mine to know what the settings are. This camera lets you get fancy or do it simple. Two thumbs up, Sony!
customer_reviews.author: Bedford Wife

customer_reviews.title: much improved from the h5
customer_reviews.text: this is my 3rd sony digital camera and each one has improved from the previous model. the sony h20 has intelligent auto which knows what type of picture you want to take and sets itself accordingly. compared to the h5, i lose 2x in zoom (10 vs 12), but the size is cut in half. i thought it would make a great backup to the h5. it looks like the h5 is the backup to my h20. i will write more when i return from new zealand and australia and let you know how the h20 faired.
customer_reviews.author: rj

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are good and really captures detail, but they look photoshopped for some reason. Some pictures look fake I'm not sure if it's the settings or not. Also the camera takes a while to take a picture which is not very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Still better than a silly smartphone's camera.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in summer 2009. I am still using it, works fine. Images crisp and clean with very nice color balance. I mostly use it as a point and shoot camera; many functions are rarely used. Battery life started to wane recently, take about 2-3s for the flash to charge. Overall a very good camera from Sony, sturdy and not gimmicky.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: I own a Sony Cybershot DSC-H20.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera 1 year ago. I can honestly say it was a great deal, I bought for 280$ or so! The price was great for all the camera holds. It's very easy to understand and to use, even the Manual features. I holds a good level of Megapixels (10.1) making your photos look stunning and almost professional. It takes the best photos during the day, thanks to the sunlight but night photos are also good, there's almost no noise shown on them but if you want the best quality on them be sure to use a tripod. I recommend this camera because of its size, lightweight and image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karol Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing my first use was of my 10 year old son jumping and spinning seven foot in the air hitting his target and receiving his Brown belt in Karate. I and all of my family were AMAZED the quality of the pics and how he was caught mid air and captured his spin and landing. I researched camera's for 4 months thru consumer rpts and numerous website, and it has been everything I expected and more.
customer_reviews.author: Helenann Brewer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT.. GREAT PHOTOS..
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera so much that I made my friends buy the same! Light enough to carry it along, GREAT PHOTOS.. great battery life! A snap to recharge when necessary! Very easy to handle.. Great Zeiss lens. Great sound and Camera. FANTASTIC SCREEN SIZE !!.. This is my XXX nth digital camera and my favorite! i SIMPLY love IT !
customer_reviews.author: Evie Bevie

customer_reviews.title: Very good, easy to use camera.
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera, the picture quality is excellent, it records HD movies and is also sturdy, it survived a pretty bad fall with just a minor adjustment. The only disadvantage it has is the small focal distance it has, you need to step away from the scene to capt it completely, other than that, it is an excellent camera.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Sony cyber-shot
customer_reviews.text: I have only had occation to use the camera once and not for very long. I thought it had a bigger internal memory but since it had virtually none, I had to wait for the memory card. I did take one picture with it and the quality was top notch. I don't know about the battery life yet but I did purchase an extra battery so I would always have a charged battery.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Don't get it
customer_reviews.text: I am a mom of two toddlers and based on other reviews, I bought this camera. I'll start with the pro's: Lightweight small enough to fit in a pocket zooms well easy to use/easy buttons large screen Cons: DOES NOT take a picture quickly! (I've adjusted the settings several times and it still takes FOREVER! I've already missed a few classic shots because of the adjusting time needed.) Sony encourages their products for use on their equipment. Refund policy stinks! Do yourself a favor and purchase a camera from COSTCO where they will refund anything/full price/no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: This Sony camera rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for our 15 year old Son for the next camera in his aspiring photography career.:) We have always been a Sony family and this one does not let us down as quality, easy to use and fantastic value for the $$. I would recommend this camera for everyone who wants a compact camera that has all the great features that you would expect in a larger full featured camera.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S.

customer_reviews.title: This camera sucks bad. Really bad
customer_reviews.text: This camera sucks bad. Really bad. Too small for larger fingers, battery run time too short. I wasted funds on this one for real.
customer_reviews.author: MANSA_MUSA

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased to find a replacement for the same camera that ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased to find a replacement for the same camera that I had used for many years. I ruined the previous one in an unfortunate accident.This camera gives excellent results. It's a nice size to handle, and will fit in a purse or pocket. There are additional lenses available for it, but I never found that was necessary with the 10x zoom and some adjustment on my computer
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I just received this camera a couple of weeks ago and really haven't put it to the test like you would for a vacation, but the pictures I have taken have turned out so much better than the last digital camera I had and I thought it was good! It has a strong flash and powerful little zoom. Easy to operate and great features.
customer_reviews.author: Shorty10

customer_reviews.title: Sony Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good camera for the money. It takes great pictures and great video. It would be nice if it was able to record stereo sound but if you're primarily looking for something that takes stills then that won't be an issue. This camera was for my cousins in Vietnam so I did not have a lot of time to play around with it but with the time spent with it, I was very satisfied with my purchase. The camera is a nice size too. Makes you feel like you're a photo nerd with an SLR camera even though you don't know anything about photography.
customer_reviews.author: Rozerem

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal
customer_reviews.text: Camera is as advertised. I noticed a strange sound when shaking softly the camera, when it is turned off. This has not been an issue so far taking pictures. Battery and battery charger are not Sony original maybe thats why life is shortened compared to a previous Sony camera I had. Over all it takes great pictures, I like the manual mode. Zoom is perfect 10x optical.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Besne

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera. I had it a few ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. I had it a few ago and it got stolen at the Miami airport, so I got this used one for a decent price. After all those years, it is still a great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Josue Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Intuitive and easy to use, with a manual mode if you prefer that. Hi-def video looks great! Xfer of pics and vids to PC couldn't be easier. Plug in supplied USB cable, copy files. No editing SW required. Same cable also has RCA plugs for video interface. An amazing camera, worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Carl Mc

customer_reviews.title: I Did My Homework. This Is The Best Deal For The Price!
customer_reviews.text: I read every review on the internet and compared all prices. I previously had a Kodak that I was happy with but needed a camera with more optical zoom for sports and inside school events. I was down to two choices the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H20 or the Kodak Easyshare Z1015IS. AFter reading all the reviews I bought the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H20 because this camera had better user reviews, was smaller, less money, and rated high by Consumer Reports. The camera is small enough to carry in your pocket but is a little heavy. The optical zoom, picture quality, and movie video are amazing. I am a very picky person and I love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lasponara

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love the smile feature where it waits for the subject to smile before taking the pic. Very happy. Only downside is it tends to automatically use twilight mode in the house which can be a little grainy, but I'm sure I just need to tweak the settings.
customer_reviews.author: kab1423

customer_reviews.title: very good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my wife's first digital camera. She is not a "techie" so simple point and shoot is important. This camera fills that order. Got a great price on Amizon making this an excellent camera purchase. picture quality seems to be very good. I purchased an extra battery pack since you cannot use regular AA or AAA batteries. The camera did not come with a memory chip so had to order that extra also. Even with the extra's the overall cost of camera was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E. Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for beginners and those proficient, as well! Easy to use. Very forgiving. Very versatile. Grows with you as you learn. Good battery life. I have purchased this camera as gifts for individuals and families and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Claja 99

customer_reviews.title: No RAW output.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best for the price. Excellent ergonomics. Flash too hot up close too weak more than fifteen feet. Controls somewhat confusing. Manual operation limited. No RAW output. Unable to disable some features that are unneeded or unwanted. Still - probably better than the rest that cost a third more.
customer_reviews.author: JWC

customer_reviews.title: The good camera for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I had used this camera before but was unable to find anywhere as Sony is already selling the next one down the line which is lighter and more fashionably designed. Iwanted this one because the weight helps me hold the camera properly and because it looks like a camera.It also shoots good pictures, they look/convey warmth. The problem was that when I finally found it on Amazon it could only be delivered in the US so I had to wait for a friend with an permanent adddress to go there. Good for the prize? or price?
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Hottinger

customer_reviews.title: Great so far.
customer_reviews.text: I also have only had the camera for a few days but am impressed with the picture quality and ease of use. It was the size I wanted for bicycle touring and general photography when I don't feel like carrying my SLR. The included multi-function USB hook-up is a bit large - fine for the desk drawer but bulky for traveling. The included picture software is only Windows compatible and I am a Mac User but the camera works fine with iPhoto software that comes with a Mac. I put up a few of my first photos since no others were available.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sigismondi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this camera! It has kind of a 70s look but all digital and super easy to use. Very intuitive. Best video sound and resolution for this type of cameras. The monitor size is perfect. Pictures are also great as the colors are quite bright and beautiful. And you can buy an adapter and lenses if you want to expand your photography. I read that it is no longer produced by Sony :( so I recommend you get one while you can. I have had it for a month and I am very happy. Every time I take it out people has to say something about its 70s look.
customer_reviews.author: sharpie

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am not a gr8 techie guy and know very less about camera's and this kinda stuff. I was looking for a camera which is beyond 8 MP and with a decent zoom. After going through the reviews in Amazon, I bought this camera and I am very happy with my choice. Image clarity is excellant for this camera even in the movie mode. 10 X Zoom looks ok when u shoot in the movie mode. I particularly like the Smile Detection technology which takes a snap automatically when a person smiles.I would definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sri Adusumilli

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera !!!!
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it claims and is easy to operate, nice optical zoom and 10MP provides excellent images. The on screen camera mode definitely helps with selecting the proper settings. The video feature is terrific and play back is very good quality. If there is one negative, it's the battery takes too long to recharge, so having a second battery solves that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen F. Fabiano

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE BEST CAMERA I'VE EVER HAD!!!
customer_reviews.text: when i read the reviews for this camera i was convinced to buy it and i did.. it came in 2 days!!! before xmass! and i loved it!! seriously! i use to have a nikon camera i returned it because it sucks! because of all the grainy pictures.. but this sony camera is almost close to an slr camera... when i let my other friends borrowed my camera they were impressed!! especially the hd video camera.. and the face detector!! it takes a picture by it self whenever you smile! here u can look at the photos i have took [...]
customer_reviews.author: TENderoni

customer_reviews.title: Sony cybershot  Dsc-H20
customer_reviews.text: I did alot of research on cameras...I finally decided on the sony.....this camera takes awsome photos....I searched for accessories on Amazon and found an extra battery, carrying case, memory stick and protective film for lcd screen.... very cheap on Amazon...when you set the camera to easy ...just press the button ...and it does it all for you...the features to take a nice photo are amazing....the H20 blows away my last digital camera ...which was a sony dsc p72....I highly recommend this camera if you can find it
customer_reviews.author: fs

customer_reviews.title: ... about 8 years now and it keeps on taking fantastic pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for about 8 years now and it keeps on taking fantastic pictures.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Our son did all the research on this camera, so when we were ready to purchase one of our own, we knew it would be a good one. He has enjoyed his a lot and we have as well. It has lots of features for the price and is very easy to use. Can't believe a camera can detect when a person is smiling! This camera is fun to use and has a nice size screen to view your pictures. It was well worth the wait to finallly get into the digital age. Great camera!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kreider

customer_reviews.title: Best and easiest camera I have ever owned!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for Thanksgiving, since most of the family was going to be together, including 4 children under the age of 7. I took over 400 photo's and each one is clear and crisp. I love the smile feature, where you can set the type of smile you want. Beyond the great pictures of the family, I also took pictures at the zoo, that are outstanding!! I would recommend this to anyone looking for a great camera, at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this camera for a little over a month, but so far so good. It takes great pictures. It works great in low lighting, no lighting, far away and close up. No issues yet, but I will write a review again if it does. I was also, surprised at its size since most cameras with 10X optical or higher tend to be bigger, this is compact for its features which is great because it fits in my old camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: CGCWO

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Nice! Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera in 2009 and in 2012 looks a little old but still is a great camera! It has a fantastic zoom and the pictures without flash are cool!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Jose Cobo Ch

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This Item is just super. The HD video taping is just excellent,Picture quality great ease of use great. You all can close your eyes and buy this one. The best mid level camera.
customer_reviews.author: ssss

customer_reviews.title: Total value for money
customer_reviews.text: For long time I was looking for a good camera. After a painstacking search I found SONY cyber shot H20 a better choice. I compared with a cannon but due to the battery life and potential mechanical problem I declined cannon. The picture quality is very good for casual use. It satisfy my appetite. Moreover, lightweight Japanese product is very portable. In many programs i went, people turn off their camera and start taking photo with mine. I just love it and enjoys taking picture with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Anisur Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber Shot DSC-H20/B Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item after using a borrowed one. It's photo quality visibly exceeded that of a much more expensive Cannon model. The screen menu is also simpler than a Kodak model I currently owned. Having both auto and manual settings in addition to the 10X optical zoom were key considerations in choosing this camera. It is a nice item for the price, when compared to other makes.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Omann

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Good Performance
customer_reviews.text: Best camera for its size. Easy to do the settings. Takes best pictures and gets natural colors brightly. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mallik

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Consumer Reports hit it right on the head when they described this as a Best Buy. You get a lot of camera for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Elgin

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for quite awhile and it's a very nice camera. Takes great pics and easy to use. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray E.

customer_reviews.title: Sony makes Good Products
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Camera for over 1 Month now. It's picture quality is amazing. It is easy to use and Auto function does everything for you. The zoom is excellent on it. It is worth the money paid for it. The only thing I would suggest is more internal memory. I got only 2 pictures on the internal memory on 10.1 MegaPixel.
customer_reviews.author: Satish Tahiliani

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So proud of my new camera, I've always had regular digital cameras and the picture quality was never good. Always missed out on the best pictures. Already taken more pictures with this camera than total combined with old camera. Love the features on this camera, especially the burst feature!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera a year ago for about 1/2 the current price and it takes great photo's. I especially like the intelligent photo selection which takes a dual shot if lighting conditions are right.
customer_reviews.author: Surf shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: A friend has this camera, so when I had the money, I bought one for myself. It has great zoom, response time and overall just a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Parrish

customer_reviews.title: sometimes slow to take picture
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes good pictures in the full light. Sometimes it is slow to take picture when it is trying to focus on face and I'll miss the great shot. Still getting used to the camera and it's features. You can take it right out of the box and start taking pictures. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: lajude

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera and would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: 2nd camera that I have owned and I use it professionally in an appraisal business. Very good camera and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the camera for about 3 weeks now and find it pretty easy to use. The picture quality seems to be good. I haven't tried printing any pictures yet. I bought an 8 MB memory card since one does not come with the camera. The only feature so far that I don't like is the lens cover, but I should have thought of that before I bought the camera. Overall I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Awkbod

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: love the 10x optical zoom, and easy to use, beautiful optics of a Sony. very pleased with the price on Amazon as well.
customer_reviews.author: FH-NYC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality/price ratio
customer_reviews.text: The camera works just fine for every day pictures. It is very easy to use and the lithium battery is an advantage in front of the other equivalent point shot cameras from other brands (Cannon, Nikon, etc). It is good for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas R. Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Great photos
customer_reviews.text: after 2 canon cameras that worked well, i was more impressed with the sony that takes excellent photos in all conditions, especially low light due to the large optical lens and flash. with just the auto settings we've already gotten great professional looking photos. sony doesn't seem to get much credit over canon, but this camera is much better than my last one.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Doubled in price in less than a year.....
customer_reviews.text: How can a camera that I paid $230 for in January of this year be selling for $439 now. This is not even Sonys latest and greatest. For that reason alone I would not buy it from Amazon. They have drastic changes in their pricing and if you believe in free shipping from Amazon I have a used car I want to sell you. They get their free shipping back 10 times over in their pricing. By the way, my 2 star rating is for Amazon... not the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Julia A Allison

customer_reviews.title: Best 1 Yet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Camera, I have tried many and this by far had the best picture quality compared to some of greater MP. Zoom quality of pictures was extremely crisp. Best cam so far. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sudduth

customer_reviews.title: 2nd cybershot
customer_reviews.text: my sony cybershot was stolen in a home burglary this past yr and i thought i wanted to upgrade so i got the sony alpha 55. top of the line camera of the year. after one month i am sending it back and purchasing another cybershot H20. the cybershot has everything i need. it is the perfect camera. picture quality beats the a55 hands down.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: The cyber shot H20 takes great pictures and videos, can~t be any better for the price. I was sorry I did not take with me at the concert I went just recently, I did not want to drop it. The only negative thing about this beauty is that it won`t fit in your pocket and is a bit heavy it would be great if it came with neck strap.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia G. Molinari

customer_reviews.title: Great point to Shoot
customer_reviews.text: It's great camera with the given price tag, the only con I can see is sport shots (stabilization is poor) rest its a great point to shoot, like this camera for response time which is far better than Cannon and Nikon I think Sony is better in point to shoot category than big players.
customer_reviews.author: Ruc S

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For a point & shoot, I love this camera. I have been using it for macro photography & am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: christopher ball

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera because you really do not need to use the flash all that much. My sister had it and I just had to have it!
customer_reviews.author: KamSwens

customer_reviews.title: A year later...still very pleased with this camera
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Takes great pictures. Solid. Lots of features. Great for photgraphing not-too-still kids! Good battery life. Only complaint was with the software used to send pics to my computer...not too intuitive a program.
customer_reviews.author: CarefulCollector

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a realy very good camera, and it's perfect for this price. The pictures are cool, you can check above, from the owners. It comes without Russian menu, but it's very easy to use it in english. Advice to everybody have this at their pocket, it's small enough, and takes originanl, true color, good quality pictures!!!Love it.
customer_reviews.author: U. Guliyeva

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera at affordable price ...
customer_reviews.text: I am encouraged to write a review for this product because I read all the reviews for this camera and I want to thank you all for suggesting me this wonderful camera. Its the best you can buy at this price. The photo quality is excellent!!! I am really happy to buy this cam. I would definitely recommend this camera to all.
customer_reviews.author: Pravin Shukla

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, compact, takes video and pics
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures and video. Compact, easy for on the go. Low light photos are a bit grainy. Love the smile detector, its fun to play with. All in one accessability: Compact, video, and photo in one. Might want to get an 8-16 gig card to hold videos.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gates

customer_reviews.title: sorry to say..
customer_reviews.text: I returned this unit, it was ok, but for the money you could do better. Sony has improved recently, might give them a try again.
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a long zoom camera for a reasonable price and I definitely got both in this camera. For an amateur photographer this is an excellent camera. Even in low lighting the pictures look great. Definitely recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J.klemm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera!  AMAZING Pictures!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 kids in sports and was tired of all the bad shots from my Canon pocket camera's 3x zoom. The 10x zoom of this camera is amazing and I must say the pictures it takes are incredible. I had another Sony mega zoom a few years back and always was in awe of how great of pictures the Sony cameras take. I took it to their games this weekend and the pictures came out great! I highly recommend this camera for this use since it's fairly compact and has great zoom!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: John Draws

customer_reviews.title: The ideal camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a steal for the price. It is easy to use and works great for our little baby. The HD video is an excellent bonus to capture fun moments with our son.
customer_reviews.author: Blake S. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for 220 bucks on amazon about a year ago, and ive seen it retail for 500. I got a good deal xD But its really good quality and a good camera. I feel like its lost its touch since when i first got it, but im still making videos with it today so, all is good =)
customer_reviews.author: Mike Squires

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Sony camera and I just love it for the zoom and for the movies. The only thing I dont like about it is the lens cover and that it is not as easy to put in my pocket or small purse. Mine got stolen in Brussels and sadly I lost all my trip photos but I am going to buy another one right now!
customer_reviews.author: E. LAMBERSON

customer_reviews.title: worth to money,
customer_reviews.text: i already gone through all the reveiws before gettign this. i bought this for 10x optical zoom , which is working good. but pictures in night time, either i need to work on how to take or this doesnt favor in it . still need to work on it .
customer_reviews.author: Ekku

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Kodak 14mp with this camera. What a huge upgrade. Better pics, video, and way better sound during video. I like this camera a lot.

customer_reviews.title: very good camera excelent
customer_reviews.text: the camera is to easy of use i recomended 100% it is easy take the picture and the zoom is perfect

customer_reviews.title: Sony camera
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased a camera just like this so I pretty much new what I was buying. Works excellent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dalia Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear and sharp pictures. The camera is easy to use. The camera does not come with a carrying case. You'll need to buy that separately. A wrist strap as a standard feature would have good. Overall good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: C. Guillen

customer_reviews.title: For the price, I found this camera to be ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I found this camera to be substandard. Images have never been sharp and the performance on average has been unsatisfactory. I have been unhappy with several Sony products of late and I believe at this point they can consider me a former customer.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sixpack

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Sony Digital Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much! I will buy more things from this seller! Thank you & God bless your business! Lân
customer_reviews.author: Lan K. Pham

customer_reviews.title: Good superzoom compact camera
customer_reviews.text: Strongly recommend to somebody who likes photography as a secondary hobby. This jewel serves all purpose with enough manual controls to get a good picture. Have fun like i did!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lim

customer_reviews.title: newer is better
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great in every way. I replaced an older cybershot that got wet one time too many. The new technology is easy to use and 1/2 the price of my original.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Hoffeld

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: easy to use. happy with the price for what i got much more features than comparable nikon and canon's
customer_reviews.author: David King

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with camera
customer_reviews.text: we have used this camera for over 3 months at home and on trips. it works well for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: ejmjr

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I needed this exact camera. They had it in stock, they had a good price, they provided very fast delivery for cheap. I would highly reccommend these guys and I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. It takes wonderful pictures and it is very easy to use. The zoom is great--my daughter graduated and I have some wonderful pictures with the zoom. I have priced this camera at several places and Amazon has the best price, free shipping, and speedy service.
customer_reviews.author: Lily K

customer_reviews.title: Great photos
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my granddaughter. She loves it and has posted some excellent photos on her blog.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera features wise
customer_reviews.text: One of my friend has suggested me. I wanted to have 12 MP camera.. but later I have deiced to have camera with more features. And that's how I selected this product. And it fullfill all my requirement. Its video quality is excellent. Not required any Camcoder. Even more than that. Good Product.
customer_reviews.author: Sumit Methi

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera, especially for a novice. Very easy to use and takes great pictures. For us ladies, it's small and fits right in our purse.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I had seen this camera being used and liked what I saw. Easy to use and very forgiving. Great photos and many other features which I still have to try.

customer_reviews.title: This camera is extremely perfect. I used it since 2009 until now
customer_reviews.text: That is my lovely Camera. This camera is extremely perfect. I used it since 2009 until now. I love it

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Camera
customer_reviews.text: I tested couple of cameras at home including canon. I found that this camera takes very good pictures. I'm very happy with this camera. The zoon is cool.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nair

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, however you need to practice how to use it professionally. very good zoom and awesome High definition video recording!!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera however
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera however, after 5 years of very sporadic use it just died. The Sony service center said the motherboard was broken. Nothing they could do.
customer_reviews.author: ANDRES SOLANO BARRANTES

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size (fits in my purse), love the optical zoom etc. This is my 3rd Sony camera, as I keep upgrading. I think you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Abram

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H20/B 10.1 MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom and Super Steady Shot Image Stabilization
product_meta.description: The Sony DSC-H20 is a full-featured point-and-shoot with outstanding high-power zoom capability and fast shutter speed. It includes Smile Shutter technology which captures smiles the moment they happen, as well as Face Detection technology to optimize focus, exposure and color for up to eight faces. Capture detailed images with 10 megapixel resolution, and get in close to the action with the 10x optical zoom Carl Zeiss lens. Intelligent Scene Recognition helps you avoid failure picture, while Sony’s Double Anti-Blur solution (Super SteadyShot optical image stabilization plus High ISO) helps keep your images blur-free. The DSC-H20 completes the package with a 3.0-Inch Clear Photo LCD Plus Display that lets you easily view your images and menu options. Supplied accessories include a rechargeable battery (NP-BG1), a battery charger (BC-CSGB), a multi-connector cable, a lens cap and the CD-ROM software. Memory sticks are only optional.
feature_bullets: 10x optical zoom Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens; Optical SteadyShot image stabilization
720p high-definition movie capture; BIONZ image processor
3.0-inch (230K pixels) LCD; Face Detection and Smile Shutter technology
11MB built-in memory; capture images to Memory Stick Duo/PRO Duo Media (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars256 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
